name: Shadow Bug Rush
summary:
ENDLESS ACTION 
Shadow Bug Rush’s action is endless! See how far you can Rush through colorful and picturesque endless levels. And of course how many monsters you can slice to pieces while doing it. 
 
 
UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS 
Choose your hero and slice with style as you unlock new characters. Whether you’re into swords of laser or of fire we’ve got you covered! 
 
 
UNVEIL NEW MONSTERS 
The world of Shadow Bug Rush is constantly evolving as you unlock new monsters, traps and glorious power ups. The more you play, the more wonders there are for you to discover.
